inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: able to read and understand English

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HIV infected on stable ART regimen for 5 months or greater

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HAM-D score is 20, which does not indicate significant cognitive slowing

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HAM-D score is 20, which indicates mild depression

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: documented CD4 count >200 within 3 months of entry visit

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: no mention of pregnancy or breast feeding

inclusion.evidence: subject is able to give informed consent

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: no mention of pregnancy or breast feeding, but subject has a history of menopause

exclusion.evidence: no mention of untreated endocrine disorders

exclusion.criterion: History of coronary artery disease, atherosclerotic disease, left ventricular hypertrophy, cardiomegaly, syncope, congestive heart failure, myocardial infarction, pacemaker, clinically significant arrhythmia, angina, history of treatment for arrhythmia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Subject has a history of menopause and is on anti-depressants for the past 6 months. She does not have any other medical conditions that would exclude her from participating in the study.
